description.en:
When Alivia Wender was younger, she was saved by a boy and wants to thank him but cannot remember his face. Her only clues are a scar on his hand and a prestigious school badge. She promised herself that she would enter the school to meet her 'prince' again. Just when her application was accepted, her family went bankrupt and can't afford her education fees! Feeling dejected, she visited the school, snuck in through a tree and managed to get enrolled...?

Will Alivia ever find her 'prince'?

This comic is serialized in Gempak Starz comic magazine from Malaysia.
